sentence.Network_en: He defeated the Turkish Sultan , Bayazid the Thunderbolt, at Angora in 1402 , and took him prisoner.
sentence.Network_cn: 1402年,他在安哥拉击败了土耳其苏丹, 并俘虏了他.

sentence.Network_en: People of their village earned a big fortune from Angora rabbit farming.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们村的人都是靠饲养安哥拉兔致富的.

sentence.Network_en: No, Angora angora fiber comes from rabbits. Angora goats produce mohair.
sentence.Network_cn: 错, 安哥拉呢来自兔子, 安哥拉山羊生产出的是马海毛.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 安哥拉兔（angora）(Angora)，根据国际ARBA组织数据记载，安哥拉兔（angora）是源于土耳其的首都安卡拉； 另一种说法是起源于英国，由法国人培育 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent. (denoting a long-haired breed): from the place name Angora

entry.tran: （山羊或兔）安哥拉种的（长有光亮的长毛）
entry.def: An angora goat or rabbit is a particular breed that has long silky hair.

entry.tran: 安哥拉山羊毛；安哥拉兔毛
entry.def: Angora cloth or clothing is made from the hair of the angora goat or rabbit.

means.word_mean: 1. raised for its long silky hair which is the true mohair
2. domestic breed with long white silky hair
3. a long-haired breed similar to the Persian cat
